featured.text: Zoe was trucked to an elephant orphanage because ________.
So she was trucked to a most unusual orphanage in Nairobi, run by a woman named Daphne Sheldrick.
The bridge collapsed under the weight of the heavy truck.

definition.zh_def: 一種大型的運輸車輛，通常用於運送貨物。
definition.en_def: A large motor vehicle designed to transport cargo.
definition.example: The truck delivered the furniture to our new house.
